block.p: Major League Baseball MLB--Suspended Atlanta manager Bobby Cox for five games and fined him an undisclosed amount for making contact with umpire Derryl Cousins in a game against Montreal on July 4.
Major League Baseball MLB--Suspended Atlanta manager Bobby Cox for five games and fined him an undisclosed amount for making contact with umpire Derryl Cousins in a game against Montreal on July 4.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated RHP Pedro Martinez from the 15-day disabled list. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated OF Manny Ramirez from the 15-day disabled list. Sent RHP Brian Williams outright to Buffalo of the International League. NEW YORK YANKEES--Recalled OF Ryan Thompson and OF Luke Wilcox from Columbus of the International League. Placed OF Wily Mo Pena on the 60-day disabled list. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Placed DH John Jaha on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 3B-OF Adam Piatt from Sacramento of the Pacific Coast League.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated 3B Matt Williams and 1B Erubiel Durazo from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned OF Rob Ryan to Tucson of the Pacific Coast League. Placed INF Danny Klassen on the 15-day disabled list. CINCINNATI REDS--Placed 3B Aaron Boone on the 15-day disabled list. COLORADO ROCKIES--Signed 3B Jeff Cirillo to a four-year contract extension, through 2005. HOUSTON ASTROS--Named Mike Maddux pitching coach for Round Rock of the Texas League. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated RHP Jeff Shaw from the 15-day disabled list. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Placed 1B Mark McGwire on the 15-day disabled list.
National Basketball Association CLEVELAND CAVALIERS--Signed C Chris Mihm. TORONTO RAPTORS--Named Stan Albeck, Jim Brewer and Craig Neal assistant coaches.
Women's National Basketball Association WNBA--Fined Utah center Margo Dydek $250 for slapping Portland guard Michell Marciniak in a game played on July 12.

National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed OT James Brown to a one-year contract and FB Aaron Shea to a three-year contract. Released LB Tramont Lawless. DENVER BRONCOS--Waived DE Willie Cohens. DALLAS COWBOYS--Released RB Beau Morgan, S Jasmine Tramel and LB Tony Ortiz. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed WR-KR Joey Jamison to a multiyear contract. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed DB David Macklin and DT Rob Renes. Agreed to terms with DE Marcus Washington. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Released LB Jeff Snedegar. JETS--Signed QB Chad Pennington to a five-year contract and FB Mike Stack. Waived WR Brandon Campbell. OAKLAND RAIDERS--Signed QB Rodney Peete.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with RW Dan Bylsma and D Dean Malkoc on one-year contracts and with LW Kevin Sawyer on a two-year contract. BOSTON BRUINS--Signed D Paul Coffey to a two-year contract. BUFFALO SABRES--Signed LW Dave Andreychuk to a one-year contract. DETROIT RED WINGS--Re-signed D Larry Murphy to a one-year contract. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed C Brett McLean. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed LW Denis Arkhipov and RW Alexander Krevsun. RANGERS--Signed C Mark Messier to a two-year contract. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Re-signed RW Jody Hull to a one-year contract. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed C Stefan Ustorf and LW-C Mark Murphy.
United States Olympic Committee USOC--Promoted senior manager of sports medicine Ed Ryan to director of sports medicine.

BIG EAST CONFERENCE--Named John Martin and Kristina Petersen communications assistants, Stacy Shiffert sport administration assistant and Heena Shah compliance assistant for the 2000-01 academic year.
